about_the_game:
A physics sandbox voxel-based simulation game for you to mess with. Build world you can imagine and destroy anything you create.
Physics Destruction is a physics sandbox voxel-based game. There aren't any predefined aims or goals. We give you the tools and leave you to play. Do every things you want here!
There are many mods and items for you to choose from, allowing you to unleash your creativity here, whether it's to destroy or build – it's all up to you.

Construction:
You spawn objects and weld them together to create your own contraptions - whether that's a car, a rocket, a catapult or something that doesn't have a name yet - that's up to you.

Destruction:
Destroy buildings, terrain and enemies using machine guns, artillery, auto cannon, tanks, helicopters, bombs, rockets and nuclear weapons.

You can build and destroy offline, or join the thousands of players who play online each day.
Much more items, mechanics, and features will be added with the coming updates. Download and Enjoy the Physics Destruction now!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04 or Greater
  • Processor: x64 SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1GB memory（dedicated VRAM or shared RAM）, Graphics card with hader model 4.0 capabilities.
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 512 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.13 or Greater
  • Processor: Intel 64-bit or Apple silicon
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1GB memory（dedicated VRAM or shared RAM）, Graphics card with hader model 4.0 capabilities.
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
